data.text:
Le Guin, Ursula K.

London: MacDonald Science Fiction, 1969.

First British edition, first printing. Signed by Ursula K. Le Guin and inscribed to a former owner on the title page, inscribed to a previous owner. Near Fine with faint wear at corners and spine ends, and a very faint stain to the top of the textblock edge. In a Near Fine unclipped dust jacket with trivial edge wear. An exceptional copy the book that first established Ursula K. Le Guin as a major sci-fi writer, winning both the Hugo and Nebula Awards for Best Novel in 1970. Item #140942411
